name: DC TV and Film's Travelin' Adventure
description: Washington D.C. is arguably the nexus of power for the entire world.  Decisions made in the nation's capital radiate around the world and this is the stuff movies are made of.  Now, its notoriously difficult for filmmakers to make movies here but they do it.  You might even remember some of the famous sites in Washington, D.C. as the settings for some of your favorite movies. In DC Film and TV's Travelin' Adventures I show you the sites that appeared in films so you can see them close up, enjoy the history behind the locations and experience just what the film directors did when they chose these sites to be in their television and film masterpieces.
